snippet.title: WBBL/03 fixture, TV times
snippet.content:
THE WBBL/03 will kick off with a carnival-style opening weekend of matches in Sydney featuring four games and broadcast live on TV. The opening weekend of the annual world-class women's cricket competition will see four matches played in Sydney at North Sydney Oval on December 9-10 along with two games in Adelaide which will be live streamed. In all 12 matches will be broadcast on Network Ten, with all remaining matches live-streamed on the CA Live platform.
WBBL/03 will see 59 matches played over 57 days with the finale scheduled for February 4. The third edition of the WBB will also see blockbuster double-headers with BBL matches, including the New Year's Eve clash in Adelaide and the Melbourne Derby at the MCG on January 6. TV Broadcast Matches (live on Ten unless stated otherwise) 9 December - Melbourne Renegades vs. Sydney Thunder 9 December - Sydney Sixers vs. Melbourne Stars 10 December - Perth Scorchers vs. Brisbane Heat 10 December - Sydney Thunder vs. Sydney Sixers 23 December - Sydney Sixers vs. Hobart Hurricanes 31 December - Adelaide Strikers vs. Brisbane Heat 13 January - Adelaide Strikers vs. Perth Scorchers 20 January - Melbourne Stars vs. Melbourne Renegades 27 January - Melbourne Stars vs. Hobart Hurricanes 1 February - Semi-Final (live on One) 2 February - Semi-Final (live on One) 4 February - Final
WOMEN'S BIG BASH LEAGUE Dec. 9: Melbourne Renegades v Sydney Thunder Hobart Hurricanes v Adelaide Strikers Sydney Sixers v Melbourne Stars Dec. 10: Perth Scorchers v Brisbane Heat Adelaide Strikers v
